resources.string: SCIEnT is a multi-disciplinary innovation centre, providing opportunities to students to delve into the ever expanding world of technology, and discover, hands on, the incredible scope for innovation that the world offers today. The lab allows students to explore and experiment with technology, without having to deal with the fear and cost of failure. At SCIEnT, students are offered a multitude of tools, machines, consumables and services, and a space in which to work, learn and grow.
